list.title: D3GraphCanvas#D3GraphCanvas
list.description: Create a new D3 graph from a JSON object. Adapted from https://observablehq.com/@d3/force-directed-graph#chart and https://www.d3indepth.com/zoom-and-pan/

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#OneParentCluster
list.description: Return true if any parent of the node is a cluster, false otherwise

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#OneParentVisible
list.description: Return true if any parent of the node is visible, false otherwise

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#addChildParent
list.description: Create and initialize the 'child' and 'parent' properties for all nodes

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#canvas
list.description: Getter for retrieving the d3 svg.

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#changeVisibilityChildren
list.description: Change the state of the node from simple node to cluster, or the opposite

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#changeVisibilityDescendants
list.description: Change the state of the node from simple node to cluster, or the opposite

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#clearCanvas
list.description: Remove nodes and lines from the SVG.

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#createNewCluster
list.description: Create a new cluster and add it to the graph

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#createNewLink
list.description: Create a new link and add it to the graph

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#createNewNode
list.description: Create a new node and add it to the graph

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#generateClusterLabel
list.description: Generate the label of a clustered node

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#generateDescendantList
list.description: Retrieve the ID of all the node's descendants

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#getChildrenByType
list.description: Returns the list of children of the node of this type

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#getChildrenType
list.description: Return a list of the node's children types

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#getNodeByGroup
list.description: Return a list of node IDs whose group is equal to groupIndex

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#getNodeByType
list.description: Return a list of node IDs whose type is equal to typeName

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#getTypeList
list.description: Return a list of the different types of nodes

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#hide
list.description: Hide the graph SVG

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#hideLink
list.description: Hide the link from the graph

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#hideNode
list.description: Hide the node from the graph

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#init
list.description: Initialize the d3 SVG canvas based on the data from a graph dataset

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#possessCycle
list.description: Return true if the graph possesses a cycle, false otherwise

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#prefixLegend
list.description: Check if a list of URIs have namespaces in the known namespace list. If so, replace the namespace of the URI with a prefix. The known namespace list is declared in a configuration file.

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#removeLink
list.description: Remove the link from the graph

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#removeNode
list.description: Remove the node from the graph

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#setLinkIndexAndNum
list.description: Set the link index and the number of links between two nodes

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#show
list.description: Show the graph SVG

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#showLink
list.description: Show the hidden link of the graph

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#showNode
list.description: Show the hidden node

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#tooltipDiv
list.description: Getter for retrieving the d3 tooltip div.

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#update
list.description: Clear and update the d3 SVG canvas based on the data from a graph dataset. Also apply event dispatchers

list.title: D3GraphCanvas#updateForceSimulation
list.description: Update the forces of the simulation

list.title: Graph
list.description: Create a new Table using D3.

list.title: Graph#clear
list.description: Remove nodes and lines from the SVG.

list.title: Graph#getLinksByIndex
list.description: Get all of the links associated with a node by node index.

list.title: Graph#getLinksByUri
list.description: Get all of the links associated with a node by node uri.

list.title: Graph#getNodeByIndex
list.description: Get a data node by index.

list.title: Graph#getNodeByUri
list.description: Get a data node by uri.

list.title: SparqlEndpointResponseProvider
list.description: Creates a SPARQL Endpoint Provider

list.title: SparqlEndpointResponseProvider#getFetch
list.description: Get the fetch request in function of the SPARQL endpoint query type.

list.title: SparqlEndpointResponseProvider#getFullUrl
list.description: Get the full URL for the SPARQL endpoint in function of the SPARQL endpoint query type.

list.title: SparqlEndpointResponseProvider#querySparqlEndpointService
list.description: Perform a SPARQL Query. Cache and return the response

list.title: SparqlQuery
list.description: Create a new empty SPARQL Query

list.title: SparqlQuery#generateQuery
list.description: Generate the SPARQL query

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow
list.description: Creates a SPARQL query window.

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#addEventListeners
list.description: Add event listeners to the graphs

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#clearDataView
list.description: Clear the DataView of content

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#configSparqlWidget
list.description: The sparqlModule view configuration.

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#d3Graph
list.description: Contains the D3 graph view to display RDF data.

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#eventListeners
list.description: The event listeners for the graphs.

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#explorationQuery
list.description: The Sparql exploration query

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#initHtml
list.description: Initialize the html of the view

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#initQueryTextAreaForm
list.description: Initialize the query text area of the view

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#initResultDisplay
list.description: Initialize the displaying of the result

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#queries
list.description: Store the queries of the SparqlQueryWindow from the config.

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#sparqlProvider
list.description: The SPARQL Endpoint Response Provider

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#table
list.description: Contains the D3 table to display RDF data.

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#updateDataView
list.description: Update the DataView

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#updateExplorationQuery
list.description: Update query to add node's children

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#updateQueryDropdown
list.description: Update this.querySelect options using an array of queries. For each element in the array, create an option element, set the innerText of the option to the query's title, set the value of the option to the index of the query in the array, then append the option to this.querySelect

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#updateQueryTextArea
list.description: Update the this.queryTextArea with the text of the query that was selected in the dropdown, or the exploration query

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow#updateResultDropdown
list.description: Remove all the children of this.resultSelect, then adds new children options based on the formats declared in each query configuration from from this.queries

list.title: Table
list.description: Create a new Table using D3.

list.title: Table#clearTable
list.description: Clear table.

list.title: Table#dataAsTable
list.description: Format and update the data in the table with data.

list.title: Table#initHtml
list.description: Initialize the html of the view

list.title: Table.update
list.description: Update the table with new data.
